Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameMaster

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameMaster
All Implemented Interfaces:
LorenzoIlMagnifico, GameMasterObserver, Observable<ModelObserver>
public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameMasterObserver, Observable<ModelObserver>, LorenzoIlMagnifico
GameMaster class manage all the action during a game.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameMaster

      public GameMaster()

    • GameMaster

      public GameMaster​(GameSetting gameSetting, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players) throws java.io.IOException
      Construct a GameMaster for the match. It creates a new Market, deck of Leader and deck of Development card, moreover if it is a single player game instantiate LorenzoIlMagnifico as a Player.
      Parameters:
      gameSetting - the class that represent the game parameter.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when there are problems opening Json files when loading game information.

      Throws:

    • getDeckDevelopmentCard

      public Development getDeckDevelopmentCard​(int row, int column) throws DeckDevelopmentCardException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Return the first development Development card in the block of card.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the development deck.
      column - the column of the development deck.
      Returns:
      the first card in the block associated with the coordinates.
      Throws:
      DeckDevelopmentCardException - if the block of cards selected is empty.
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are out of the matrix bounds.
